item.title: About
item.description: Hi. I’m Bytewave. Or Byte. Or Eliot. Whichever you prefer; I’m not picky. I make things and break things… mostly break things. I’m a junior software developer with a passion for security. I dabble in lots of projects, languages, and technologies, such as: Python TypeScript / JavaScript Ruby / Rails C# Rust C Java PHP Most of my work can be found on my GitHub. Thanks for stopping by!
item.content:
Hi. I’m Bytewave.

Or Byte. Or Eliot. Whichever you prefer; I’m not picky.

I make things and break things… mostly break things.

I’m a junior software developer with a passion for security. I dabble in lots of projects, languages, and technologies, such as:

  • Python
  • TypeScript / JavaScript
  • Ruby / Rails
  • C#
  • Rust
  • C
  • Java
  • PHP

Most of my work can be found on my GitHub.

Thanks for stopping by! ðŸ’š
